column1: Jp
column2: En

column1:
白竜からの力を受け取った
この技がお前に扱えるかを見極めるのが
私の役割ということだな
column2:
My role is to determine whether you can
handle this power received from the White
Dragon.

column1:
いいだろう
試練の場を用意する
そこで落ち合おう
column2:
Very well.
I shall prepare the trial grounds.
Let us meet there.

column1:
試練の場を用意した
そこで落ち合おう
――どうした、行かないのか？
column2:
I have prepared the trial grounds.
Let us meet there.
—What’s wrong? Not going?

column1:
よし、来たな！
今回は私も共に戦い、その中で
直に手ほどきしてやろう
――行くぞ！
column2:
Good, you've come! This time, I will fight
by your side and teach you directly.
Let's go!

column1:
さぁ、お前の器を見せてもらおうか
様々な技を駆使し、敵をかく乱してやれ
column2:
Now, show me your potential!
Make use of your skills, and bewilder your foes!

column1:
いたぞ、あそこだ
あの敵が最初の試練だ
column2:
There it is, over there.
That enemy is the first trial.

column1: いいぞ、次は第二の試練の場所へ向かうぞ
column2: Good, now let's head to the second trial.

column1:
気付いたな？
第二の試練だ
column2:
You noticed, didn't you?
This is the second trial.

column1: よし、最後の試練へ向かうぞ！
column2: Alright, let’s head to the final trial!

column1:
いよいよ最後の試練だ
心してかかれ！
column2:
At last, the final trial.
Face it with resolve!

column1:
日々の研鑽ぶりが伝わってくる戦いぶりだった！
いいだろう、一度グリッテン砦に戻り
そこで正式に戦技を継承するとしよう
column2:
Your fighting style reflects daily refinement!
Very well, return to Gritten Fort, and there, 
I will formally pass down the combat art.

column1:
予想以上に強くなったようだな
日々の研鑽が伝わってくる戦いぶりだった――
column2:
Seems you've grown stronger than expected.
Your daily training shone through in this fight.

column1:
では、一度グリッテン砦へ戻り
そこで戦技を正式に継承しよう
column2:
Then, return to Gritten Fort,
and there, 
I will formally pass down the combat art.

column1:
この戦技はお前自身が戦いの中で
つかみ取った新たな力だ
column2:
This skill is a new power you yourself
have seized in the midst of battle.

column1:
今後も技を磨き、最高の剣士となった姿を
私に見せてみろ
お前にならそれも可能だろう
column2:
Keep honing your skills and show me the day
you become the greatest swordsman. I know
you have it in you.

column1: 前線で戦う者は不屈の闘志を常に持つことだ
column2:
Those who fight on the front lines must 
always possess unyielding fortitude.

column1: スキルの特性を理解することを怠るな
column2:
Do not neglect to understand 
the traits of your skills.

column1: 防御と攻撃、どちらを行うべきか見極めろ
column2: Determine whether to defend or attack.

column1: 攻撃を受ける瞬間にガードすることを忘れるな
column2:
Do not forget to guard 
the moment you are attacked.

column1: 目的に合わせ、スキルだけでなくアビリティも考慮しろ
column2:
Consider not only skills but also 
augments to suit the purpose.

column1: ここをお前が守る前線と思え！
column2: Consider this your frontline to defend!

column1: 集中的に攻撃する頃合いというものがある
column2: Timing is key for focused attacks.

column1: 敵との間合いをよく考えろ
column2:
Consider well the distance 
between you and the enemy.

column1: 敵がダウンしたら見逃すな
column2: When they're down, press the attack.

column1: 敵の動きを見極め、ガードするタイミングを把握しろ！
column2:
Read the enemy’s movements and grasp
the timing to guard!
